verses.text: \w Have|strong="H6430"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, O God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* man \w is|strong="H1732"\w* attempting \w my|strong="H5921"\w* destruction; every day \w he|strong="H1732"\w* makes cruel attacks \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* haters \w are|strong="H3117"\w* ever ready \w to|strong="H3117"\w* put \w an|strong="H3588"\w* end \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*; \w great|strong="H0430"\w* numbers \w are|strong="H3117"\w* lifting themselves \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fear, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* faith \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* give praise \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* word; \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w put|strong="H0982"\w* \w my|strong="H0982"\w* hope; \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* no \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w what|strong="H3372"\w* flesh \w may|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H1697"\w* day \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* wrong use \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* evil.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* come \w together|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* waiting \w in|strong="H5921"\w* secret \w places|strong="H3605"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* take note \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul.

\w By|strong="H0834"\w* evil-doing \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* get free \w from|strong="H5315"\w* punishment. \w In|strong="H5315"\w* wrath, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* God, \w let|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* peoples \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* low.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* seen \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wanderings; \w put|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* drops \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eyes \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* bottle; \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* not \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* record?

When \w I|strong="H7760"\w* send \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* cry \w to|strong="H5612"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* haters \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7760"\w* back; \w I|strong="H7760"\w* am certain \w of|strong="H5612"\w* this, \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* with \w me|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* word; \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* word.

\w In|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* put \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hope, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* man \w may|strong="H0430"\w* do \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* memory \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* debt \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* give \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* offerings \w of|strong="H0430"\w* praise.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* taken \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* power \w of|strong="H0430"\w* death; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* kept \w my|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w from|strong="H5921"\w* falling, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* walking \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H0430"\w* life.
